alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; James City; Newport News; Surry; Sussex; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 9:12PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CHARLES CITY... NORTHERN ISLE OF WIGHT...YORK...NORTHEASTERN SUSSEX...SOUTHERN JAMES CITY...AND SURRY COUNTIES...THE CITY OF POQUOSON...THE CITY OF HAMPTON...THE CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS AND THE CITY OF WILLIAMSBURG THROUGH 1000 PM EDT... At 911 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Busch Gardens to near Dendron. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newport News, Hampton, Williamsburg, Smithfield, Surry, Langley AFB, Queens Lake, Virginia Institute For Marine Sciences, College Of William And Mary, Christopher Newport University, Patrick Henry Field, Seaford, Gloucester Point, Northampton, Dendron, Busch Gardens, Rescue, Carver Gardens, Tabb, and Elberon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for eastern, southeastern and east central Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; James City; Newport News; Surry; Sussex; York
